argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pser.g | |- G = ( x e. CC |-> ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ` n ) x. ( x ^ n ) ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | radcnv.a | |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) |
| 3 |  | psergf.x | |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | radcnvlem2.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | radcnvlem2.a | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` X ) < ( abs ` Y ) ) |
| 6 |  | radcnvlem2.c | |- ( ph -> seq 0 ( + , ( G ` Y ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nn0uz | |- NN0 = ( ZZ>= ` 0 ) |
| 8 |  | #P_0zd | |- ( ph -> 0 e. ZZ ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_psergf | |- ( ph -> ( G ` X ) : NN0 --> CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvco3 | |- ( ( ( G ` X ) : NN0 --> CC /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( ( abs o. ( G ` X ) ) ` k ) = ( abs ` ( ( G ` X ) ` k ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( ( abs o. ( G ` X ) ) ` k ) = ( abs ` ( ( G ` X ) ` k ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( ( G ` X ) ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_radcnvlem2 | |- ( ph -> seq 0 ( + , ( abs o. ( G ` X ) ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 14 | 7, 8, 11, 12, 13 | #P_abscvgcvg | |- ( ph -> seq 0 ( + , ( G ` X ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
